description: Security and Privacy Controls for Information Systems and Organizations

controls.name: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources.

controls.name: Information Flow Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for controlling the flow of information within the system and between connected systems.

controls.name: Protection of Information at Rest
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of information at rest.

controls.name: Cryptographic Protection
controls.description: Implement FIPS-validated or NSA-approved cryptography in accordance with applicable federal laws.

controls.name: Identification and Authentication (Organizational Users)
controls.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate organizational users.

controls.name: Authenticator Management
controls.description: Manage system authenticators by verifying authenticator content, implementing password complexity requirements, and protecting against unauthorized disclosure.

controls.name: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Monitor and control communications at the external boundary and at key internal boundaries.

controls.name: Information Flow Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for controlling the flow of information within the system and between connected systems.

controls.name: Flaw Remediation
controls.description: Identify, report, and correct information system flaws. Test software updates before installation.

controls.name: Malicious Code Protection
controls.description: Employ malicious code protection mechanisms at information system entry and exit points.

controls.name: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources.

controls.name: Remote Access
controls.description: Establish and manage remote access sessions with appropriate access controls.

controls.name: Least Privilege
controls.description: Employ the principle of least privilege, allowing only authorized accesses necessary for users to accomplish tasks.

controls.name: Configuration Settings
controls.description: Establish mandatory configuration settings for IT products with security capabilities.

controls.name: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Monitor and control communications at the external boundary and at key internal boundaries.

controls.name: System Interconnections
controls.description: Authorize connections from the information system to other information systems through the use of Interconnection Security Agreements.

controls.name: Least Privilege
controls.description: Employ the principle of least privilege, allowing only authorized accesses necessary for users to accomplish tasks.

controls.name: Identification and Authentication (Organizational Users)
controls.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate organizational users.

controls.name: Information Flow Enforcement

controls.description: Monitor and control communications at the external boundary and at key internal boundaries.

controls.name: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources.

controls.name: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Monitor and control communications at the external boundary and at key internal boundaries.

controls.name: Use of External Systems
controls.description: Establish terms and conditions for external systems to access information systems. Limit use of portable storage devices on external systems.
